sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"害怕的，怕的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: afraid, fearful, awful, dreadful, frightful, terrible, horrible, terrific, appalling
means: afraid ：指由于胆小或怯懦而不敢说或做某事。
fearful ：普通用词，既指外界情况变化而引起的恐惧，又指来自内心的害怕与焦虑。
awful ：指威严得令人害怕或敬畏，有一定的感情色彩。
dreadful ：指使人非常恐惧，毛骨悚然，也使人感到讨厌而退缩。
frightful ：指使人陷入短暂的惊恐或产生毛骨悚然的感觉。
terrible ：侧重指给人以长久的惊骇，极端的恐怖，令人难以忍受。
horrible ：指因骇人听闻的丑恶而令人毛骨悚然，着重厌恶的成分多于害怕。
terrific ：多指外表、形状或力量等的可怕。
appalling ：指既令害怕又使人惊异、胆寒。

sentence.Network_en: I don't know how often I heard the same awful jokes.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种千篇一律的烂笑话我不知道听过多少回了。

sentence.Network_en: I've got an awful lot of work to do.
The helicopter turned at an awful angle before righting itself.
sentence.Network_cn: 直升机在恢复平稳之前倾斜得很厉害。

list.abs: awful是什么意思例句引申意_百度知道 ... 10.Was awful sick. 病得很重 1.How awful 太可怕了 2.an awful joke 一个讨厌的笑话.
九句地道英语怎么说？ - 剑武江南 - 博客园 ... That's terrible! 好恐怖！ How awful! 可怕噢！ What a nightmare! 真是恶梦一场！.
英语日常用语365句 - 豆丁网 ... It's awesome. 棒极了! It's awful. 真糟糕。 It's been a long time. 好久不见了。.
人教版七年级英语重点语句_百度知道 ... 10. a bus trip 一次（长途）汽车旅行 11. be awful 很讨厌的；糟糕的 12. all day 整天.
... 蓝领工人 Blue-collar worker 烂摊子 awful mess 蓝牙技术 bluetooth.

jx.jx_en_mean: a very large amount; a great deal

lj.lj_ly: we've had an awful lot of letters.
you've still got an awful lot to learn.

entry.def: If you say that someone or something is awful, you dislike that person or thing or you think that they are not very good.

example.ex: We met and I thought he was awful...
example.tran: 我们见了面，我觉得他很讨人厌。

example.ex: I couldn't stand London! Bloody awful place.
example.tran: 我在伦敦再也呆不下去了！简直是个糟糕至极的地方。

entry.tran: 使人不愉快的；令人震惊的；可怕的；极坏的
entry.def: If you say that something is awful, you mean that it is extremely unpleasant, shocking, or bad.

example.ex: Her injuries were massive. It was awful...
Some of their offences are so awful they would chill the blood.
example.tran: 他们的一些罪行骇人听闻，简直令人毛骨悚然。

entry.def: If you look or feel awful, you look or feel ill.

example.ex: I hardly slept at all and felt pretty awful...
example.tran: 我基本上没睡，觉得很难受。

example.ex: I looked awful and felt quite shaky.
example.tran: 我貌似生病了，觉得很虚弱。

entry.def: You can use awful with noun groups that refer to an amount in order to emphasize how large that amount is.

example.ex: I've got an awful lot of work to do.

entry.tran: （与表示特征的形容词连用，用于强调）极度地，非常
entry.def: You can use awful with adjectives that describe a quality in order to emphasize that particular quality.

example.ex: You know, 10 years sounds like an awful long time.
example.tran: 你知道，10年听起来遥遥无期。

sentences.sentence: "an unspeakable odor came sweeping into the room"

means.word_mean: 2. causing fear or dread or terror;

sentences.sentence: "a career or vengeance so direful that London was shocked"
"polio is no longer the dreaded disease it once was"
"Will he say nasty things at my funeral?"- Ezra Pound

means.word_mean: 4. inspired by a feeling of fearful wonderment or reverence;
5. inspiring awe or admiration or wonder;

sentences.sentence: "the Grand Canyon is an awe-inspiring sight"
"this sea, whose gently awful stirrings seem to speak of some hidden soul beneath"- Melville
"Westminster Hall's awing majesty, so vast, so high, so silent"

example.en: Ain't it god-awful cold in here?

jushi.chinese: 一件可怕的事故发生了。

jushi.english: She did not say a word, being overpowered with awful fear.
jushi.chinese: 她惊恐万状,说不出话来。
